GET /api.description: Serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: Serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

queries.topic: Get articles corresponding to a given topic
queries.sort_by: Sort by a given category (defaults to created_at)
queries.order: Decide whether to sort in ascending or descending order (defaults to descending order)
queries.limit: Limits the number of articles given
queries.p: Start at the given page number

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves an object representation of an article given an id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Increments the vote count of an article by some amount

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Increments the vote count of a comment by some amount
